channel.title: How I long tor a shitty delta server
channel.description: I remember in August playing the best server I ever played. Black Angel, it was a shit server that had tons of glitches and a tucked up economy. Rock crabs dropped 5mand furies, you would get 1m a kill in funk, if you wore dh legs you got the full dh effect, this made dfs average hit around 62 and a claw spec around 92 through prayer. No one ever pked legit, there was a pk box but it was multi and you couldn't teleport so. naturally there was a team of farcasters and tanks there (like me). There was a huge looting problem,the spawn rate for items was 1minute not 2. Also all expensive customs were always at the bottom of the pile. the servers codes probably look like a 5year old hit the keyboard randomly got no errors. Even though this server was shit and only had 50+ players I must say it was the best server I have ever played. Discuss.

item.title: How I long tor a shitty delta server
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

best server i ever played, kingscape 100+ players weekly, excellent economy, fair wild, and amazing duping fixes that autor teleport upon dupe, server ended around early 2009, the owner was a coding wizard, and we never had any issues with mostly anything, other than the client had the map glitch of course, and being the client coder i fixed that with the gameframe.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“I Vain I”]If you miss the server, re-make it yourself?

I don’t see why anyone would want to discuss a server that failed.[/quote]

It didn’t fail… Owner died.

item.title: How I long tor a shitty delta server
item.dc:creator: @teufel teufel
item.description:
@teufel wrote:

It was a terrible server but it was a shit load of fun and it reminded me of servers from long ago. The owner didn’t care about having many players or being at the top of a list, it was about having fun.
